articles.content: Yes Bank has concluded assigning its stressed asset loan portfolio to JC Flowers Asset Reconstruction Company (ARC). The completion of the assignment of Yes Banks non-performing assets amounts to Rs … [+2073 chars]

articles.title: Govt likely to sell 11% stake in IRFC by FY24 as part of disinvestment plan - Business Standard
articles.description: Senior officials say govt plans to bring own shareholding down to 75

articles.title: Hyundai Ai3 Subcompact SUV Launch Timeline, Features, Details - India Car News
articles.description: Hyundai is working on an all-new subcompact SUV, which has recently been spotted in South Korea. The spotted model appears bigger than the Casper Micro SUV on sale in the home market, which suggests that this model will arrive in our market. Internally codena…
